title: ScreenFlow 4.0.2(K)
description: Record your screen. Edit your video. Share with the world.Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Get your video on the web with Telestream ScreenFlow award-winning screen recording and video editing software. With ScreenFlow you can record the contents of your entire computer screen while also capturing your video camera, microphone and (with optional components) your computer audio. The easy-to-use editing interface lets you creatively edit your video; add additional images, text, or music; and add transitions for a truly professional-looking video. The finished result is an MPEG-4 or QuickTime movie, ready for publishing to your Web site, blog or directly to YouTube or Vimeo.
